Title: A Note Left by Carlotta
Text:
I've learned what happened in the Vault.

Now, I have another secret to share with you. I've left something special for you here, and I trust it will please you.

You're welcome to keep the clearance device. It will grant access to the "hidden challenge" I've prepared for you.

You'll find our "employment agreement" won't be so easily concluded.

Oh, and the Acolyte also has something for you. I've included it here with this note.
